description.author: John MacFarlane
description.synopsis: Generates citations and bibliography from CSL styles.
description.description:
citeproc parses CSL style files and uses them to
generate a list of formatted citations and bibliography
entries.  For more information about CSL, see
<https://citationstyles.org/>.

package-flags.name: icu
package-flags.description: Use Haskell bindings to the ICU library
